channel.title: CVE Feed for Suite CRM -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1644|2024-02-19T23:54:29.274Z -- suite%20crm -- suite%20crm
item.description:
Suite CRM version 7.14.2 allows including local php files. This is possible
because the application is vulnerable to LFI.
